verse.roman:
tasya medhātithis tasmāt
praskannādyā dvijātayaḥ
putro 'bhūt sumate rebhir
duṣmantas tat-suto mataḥ

synonyms: tasya—of him (Kaṇva); medhātithiḥ—a son named Medhātithi; tasmāt—from him (Medhātithi); praskanna-ādyāḥ—sons headed by Praskanna; dvijātayaḥ—all brāhmaṇas; putraḥ—a son; abhūt—there was; sumateḥ—from Sumati; rebhiḥ—Rebhi; duṣmantaḥ—Mahārāja Duṣmanta; tat-sutaḥ—the son of Rebhi; mataḥ—is well-known.
translation: The son of Kaṇva was Medhātithi, whose sons, all brāhmaṇas, were headed by Praskanna. The son of Rantināva named Sumati had a son named Rebhi. Mahārāja Duṣmanta is well known as the son of Rebhi.
